title: Roasted Cauliflower Toast with Whipped Goat Cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread cauliflower out on sheet pan and toss with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Roast for about 45 minutes or until slightly charred and tender.
While cauliflower is roasting, place goat cheese and feta cheese in a small food processor (or blender) and blend until smooth. Add milk if needed to get the mixture moving.

Assemble the toast: Spread cheese mixture on piece of toasted baguette. Top with a few pieces of cauliflower and sprinkle with a bit of lemon zest and chopped mint. Finish with a touch of black pepper and serve!
